resources.string: Ents is an appliction that completely free and shares more than 70% revenue / profit for you. From earned income, you can donate to one of the 2,000 charities in 110 countries or withdraw money for yourself. The choice is in your hands!
1. Make money while communicating with society: We share more than 70% of our revenue with the community.
2. Use your income to work well through Charitable Organizations.
3. Withdraw money to your bank, credit card or PayPal account
4. International calls at the lowest rates; Free phone calls and video calls between phone numbers
Privacy Mode: Use the best security feature, in there, the messages will be automatically deleted when you end the chat. / n Sincerely.
Cosy is a free application and you can earn extra income without having to spend any amount of money. Moreover, calls among numbers in Cosy are also free!
Get rewards for everything that you and your level 8 network do on Ents. We share more than 70% of our total revenue / profit!
Transfer coins to real money when you donate to one of the 2,000 charities or withdraw money.
Cosy is favorite in all over the world! See reviews from the community.
Ents is a new economic system in which the majority of economic benefits are shared with the community. And then, the community continues to share to help the world.
"The fastest way to join Ents is from a friend\'s personal page or simply sign up with help from one of our featured members:"

resources.string: Name must be more than 3 characters
